Text.Page:
Mission Orders

Clear the road to Pora Elinu of {@LinkCreature:15#4#castanic recruits} and {@LinkCreature:15#5#amani recruits}.

Report to Prefect Madron when mission is complete.
Nice work! Use this reward to spruce up your gear.
When you kill those {@LinkCreature:15#4#castanic recruits} and {@LinkCreature:15#5#amani recruits}, keep their service amulets!
